name: Agrostema githago
details: Corn-cockle - Burning sensation in stomach, through oesophagus into throat, in lower abdomen and anus; nausea, bitter vomiting, impaired locomotion; difficulty in remaining erect; vertigo and HEADACHE, BURNING FROM LOWER JAW TO VERTEX - active constituent is SAPONIN, which causes violent sneezing and sharp burning taste; burning in stomach, extends to oesophagus, neck and breast; vertigo, headache, difficult locomotion, burning sensation.
